name: Last Chance (Rubèn Salvador)
description:
LAST CHANCE

Last Chance is a 2D platform game in which you play as Uve, the only hope of mankind. Travel back in time and run at speed of light through the streets of the platinum city in search of the world's last resources.

The game has been developed by Grup 15, which was made up of four other members apart from me. I worked as a developer and designer. 

Rubèn Salvador - 24/06/2020
